47418.「『評判』っていうのは 職人として 人から\n どれくらい評価されてるかを 示す:
Reputation is a measure of how well you're regarded by others as a craftsman. You can check your current reputation by looking at
your Strength... For example, if someone equips a piece of armor you made, your reputation goes up... The higher the level
and the better the armor, the higher the reputation... But no matter how many people equip your armor, your reputation won't rise
in a single day... What's important is the daily accumulation... Isn't that right? Besides, reputation is just that, a
reputation. To improve your skills, you have to work hard.
